amendment.description: To make funds available for the treatment and prevention of HIV/AIDS and should also include programs and activities that are designed to maintain and preserve the families of those persons afflicted with HIV/AIDS and to reduce the numbers of orphans created by HIV/AIDSefforts.

vote.text: Amendment SA 144 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 144 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum. (consideration: CR S1427-1429) To make funds available for the treatment and prevention of HIV/AIDS and should also include programs and activities that are designed to maintain and preserve the families of those persons afflicted with HIV/AIDS and to reduce the numbers of orphans created by HIV/AIDSefforts.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 144 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 144 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Santorum.
